texts.overview: [color=title]Mega Bomb[/color] supercharges the power of a bomb, increasing the blast radius and causing rampant destruction. Using a Mega Bomb will require [color=title]2 ordinary bombs[/color] to fuel the explosion.

confirm.header:
If you unlock [color=title]Mega Bomb[/color], you will lose access to the [color=title]Remote Bomb[/color] skill.
Future upgrades to [color=title]Mega Bomb[/color] reduce the [color=title]bomb fuel requirement[/color] and eventually increase the [color=title]blast radius[/color].

receipt.footer: You will no longer have access to the [color=title]Remote Bomb[/color] skill.

texts.overview: The first upgrade to [color=title]Mega Bomb[/color] reduces the fuel requirement to [color=title]1 bomb[/color]. The blast radius remains the same.
